short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhances the comparison view in Google Search Console by adding calculated differences.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your Google Search Console experience with the Search Console Enhancer. This Chrome extension is designed to streamline your performance reporting by providing precise calculations and displaying percentage changes for clicks, impressions, CTR (Click-Through Rate), and positions directly within your dashboard.

With Search Console Enhancer, you can easily view percentage changes for key metrics by simply clicking the extension icon on your browser toolbar. This feature allows you to get immediate insights into your performance metrics without navigating away from your current page.

No more manual calculations. Our extension delivers instant insights into your key metrics, allowing you to quickly obtain the information you need without any extra effort. Search Console Enhancer integrates seamlessly with Google Search Console, making the tracking and analysis of your data a simple and convenient process.

Built with your productivity and accuracy in mind, this extension offers a user-friendly interface and precise calculations, helping you efficiently manage SEO reporting and make informed decisions based on up-to-date data. Search Console Enhancer is an indispensable tool for SEO professionals, designed to optimize your work and elevate your analytics capabilities.

Created with the needs of modern users in mind, our extension ensures enhanced work quality and simplifies complex processes. Let Search Console Enhancer become your reliable partner in managing SEO performance and analytics.
